feed.title: The Penalty Flag
feed.subtitle: On "The Penalty Flag", Chris and Tony are going to be talking about the week that was, the week that will be, and every controversy on the gridiron. There may be some yelling involved and flags thrown. This isn’t your average sports debate show. The stakes have never been higher.

author.name: High Tops Media & Chris Ashe, Tony Smith

entry.title: Divisional Round: Greatest. Playoff. Weekend. Ever. - Season 1 Episode 15

link.title: Divisional Round: Greatest. Playoff. Weekend. Ever. - Season 1 Episode 15

entry.content:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss the greatest playoff weekend in NFL history, the overtime rule controversy, and who will advance to Super Bowl 56. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/thepenaltyflagpodcast/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Wild Card Weekend - Season 1 Episode 14
entry.content:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss the controversial ending to the 49ers v.s Dallas game, will Aaron Rodgers break his playoff curse, and who will advance to the conference championship. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/thepenaltyflagpodcast/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Week 18: Playoffs?!?! - Season 1 Episode 13
entry.content:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss the epic collapse of the Colts season, the crazy finish of the regular season, and the first playoff prediction bracket of the 2021 playoffs. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/thepenaltyflagpodcast/

entry.title: Week 17: The Final Stretch - Season 1 Episode 12

link.title: Week 17: The Final Stretch - Season 1 Episode 12

entry.content:
This week, Chris and Tony cap off the 2021 regular season with the retaking of the AFC lead by the Titans, Antonio Brown’s departure from the Buccaneers, and Chris and Tony make their playoff predictions of who will take those last Wild Card Spots. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/thepenaltyflagpodcast/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Week 15: MVP MVP MVP - Season 1 Episode 11

link.title: Week 15: MVP MVP MVP - Season 1 Episode 11

entry.content:
This week, Chris discusses the recent failed two point conversion attempts by the Ravens, the incredible Lions upset win against the Cardinals, and Chris dives into his first playoff prediction bracket. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/thepenaltyflagpodcast/

entry.title: Week 14: House of Cards - Season 1 Episode 10

link.title: Week 14: House of Cards - Season 1 Episode 10

entry.content:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss if the Bills should panic, the firing of Urban Meyer, and the shakeup in the NFC. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

entry.title: Week 13: The Wind Bowl - Season 1 Episode 9

link.title: Week 13: The Wind Bowl - Season 1 Episode 9

entry.content:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss the Lions winning their first game, the future of the Washington Football Team, and the reclaiming of the AFC by the Patriots. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Week 11: Division Shake Up - Season 1 Episode 8

link.title: Week 11: Division Shake Up - Season 1 Episode 8

entry.content:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss the collapse of the Bills, the rise of the Vikings, and the possible dark horse who can change everything. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

entry.title: Week 10: They’re Baaaaack - Season 1 Episode 7
entry.content:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss if the Chiefs are back to being the Chiefs, are the Patriots back to being a top team in the AFC, and are the Rams overhyped? All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Week 9: Alter Egos - Season 1 Episode 6
entry.content:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss one of the wildest weeks of the NFL season, where division leaders are in jeopardy, dark horses rise, and many teams change their identity. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/thepenaltyflagpodcast/
